metadata.title: CVE-2023-52590 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ocfs2:Avoid touching renamed directory if parent does not change The VFS will notbe locking moved directory if its parent does not change. Change ocfs2rename code to avoid touching renamed directory if its parent does notchange as without locking that can corrupt the filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
